org.jcatapult.mvc.parameter.el
Interface MethodVerifier

All Known Implementing Classes:
GetMethodVerifier, SetMethodVerifier
public interface MethodVerifier

This interface defines a mechanism for the MemberAccessor class to verify that a JavaBean method is valid. These methods need not conform to the JavaBean specification.

Method Summary
 Type determineGenericType(Method method)
          Determines the generic type of the property.

          Returns the property type for the property that the given method belongs to.

          Whether or not this property is an indexed property.
 String isValid(Method method, PropertyInfo info)
          Verifies if the property method is valid or not.
 

Method Detail

isValid

String isValid(Method method,
               PropertyInfo info)
Verifies if the property method is valid or not. The BeanPropertyInfo in case anything additional about the property is needed.

Parameters:
method - The method to verify.
info - The info about the property if needed. This might not be completely filled out yet because it is built as the reflection occurs.
Returns:
An error if the property method is invali or null if the method is valid.

determineType

Class<?> determineType(Method method)
Returns the property type for the property that the given method belongs to.

Parameters:
method - The method to return the property for.
Returns:
The type and never null. This method is called after the isValid method is called and therefore the method is valid.

isIndexed

boolean isIndexed(Method method)
Whether or not this property is an indexed property.

Parameters:
method - The method to determine if it is indexed.
Returns:
True if indexed or false otherwise.

determineGenericType

Type determineGenericType(Method method)
Determines the generic type of the property.

Parameters:
method - The method to pull the generic type from.
Returns:
The generic type.
